summary: An ordinance relating to the Grade Separation Site at 15th Avenue West and Emerson Street as authorized by Ordinance No. 86751; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of additional land and other property necessary for the construction of a pedestrian overpass in connection therewith; and providing that the entire cost of such improvement shall be paid from the Seattle General Arterial Improvement Bond 1954 Fund.
